values.customerCanNotChat: You have not finished your previous chat
values.FINISHED_BY_CUSTOMER: The customer has finished the chat. Thank you
values.FINISHED_BY_PROFESSIONAL: The professional has finished the chat. Thank you
values.FINISHED_BY_ADMIN: The system has finished the chat. Sorry if this cause you anny issue
values.FINISHED_BY_OVERTIME: The chat has reach its time limit. You can add funds and start a new chat
values.FINISHED_BY_NO_ANSWER: We are sorry, but the professional did not reply to the chat request
values.DECLINED_BY_PROFESSIONAL: We are sorry, but the professional decline the chat request
values.LOST_CONNECTION_CUSTOMER: We are sorry, but the chat has been finish because we can not reach the customer
values.LOST_CONNECTION_PROFESSIONAL: We are sorry, but the chat has been finish because we can not reach the professional
